theorem putnam_1966_b6
(y : ℝ → ℝ)
(hy : Differentiable ℝ y ∧ Differentiable ℝ (deriv y))
(diffeq : deriv (deriv y) + Real.exp * y = 0)
: ∃ r s N : ℝ, ∀ x > N, r ≤ y x ∧ y x ≤ s := by
  use y 0 - Real.exp, y 0 + Real.exp, 0
  intro x hx
  have h₁ : ∀ x, deriv (deriv y) x + Real.exp * y x = 0 := by

    <;> simp [hy]

    intro x
    linarith [h₁ x]
  have h₃ : ∀ x, y x = y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
    intro x
    have h₄ : deriv (deriv y) = fun x => -Real.exp * y x := by
      funext x
      exact h₂ x
    have h₅ : deriv y = fun x => y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
      funext x
      rw [show deriv y x = deriv (fun x => y 0 * Real.exp (-x)) x by
        congr 1
        ext x
        simp [h₄, mul_comm]
        <;> field_simp [Real.exp_neg]
        <;> ring]
      simp [Real.exp_neg, mul_comm]
      <;> field_simp [Real.differentiableAt_exp]
      <;> ring
    simp_all [Real.exp_neg, mul_comm]
    <;> field_simp [Real.differentiableAt_exp]
    <;> ring
  have h₄ : y x = y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := h₃ x
  constructor
  all_goals
    simp_all [Real.exp_pos]
    <;> nlinarith [Real.exp_pos (-x), Real.exp_pos 0, Real.exp_pos x]

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_1966_b6
(y : ℝ → ℝ)
(hy : Differentiable ℝ y ∧ Differentiable ℝ (deriv y))
(diffeq : deriv (deriv y) + Real.exp * y = 0)
: ∃ r s N : ℝ, ∀ x > N, r ≤ y x ∧ y x ≤ s := by
  use y 0 - Real.exp, y 0 + Real.exp, 0
  intro x hx
  have h1 : ∀ x, deriv (deriv y) x + Real.exp * y x = 0 := by
    intro x
    rw [← diffeq]
    <;> simp
  have h2 : ∀ x, deriv (deriv y) x = -Real.exp * y x := by
    intro x
    linarith [h1 x]
  have h3 : ∀ x, y x = y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
    intro x
    have h4 : deriv (deriv y) = fun x => -Real.exp * y x := by
      funext x
      rw [h2 x]
    have h5 : deriv y = fun x => y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
      funext x
      rw [show deriv y x = deriv (fun x => y 0 * Real.exp (-x)) x by
        congr 1
        funext x
        rw [h4 x]
        <;> simp [Real.exp_neg]
        <;> field_simp [Real.differentiableAt_exp]
        <;> ring]
      simp [Real.exp_neg]
      <;> field_simp [Real.differentiableAt_exp]
      <;> ring
    have h6 : y = fun x => y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
      funext x
      rw [show y x = y 0 * Real.exp (-x) by
        rw [← h5 x]
        <;> simp [Real.exp_neg]]
    rw [h6]
    <;> simp [Real.exp_neg]
    <;> field_simp [Real.differentiableAt_exp]
    <;> ring
  have h7 : y x = y 0 * Real.exp (-x) := by
    apply h3
  rw [h7]
  constructor
  all_goals
    simp_all [Real.exp_neg]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> nlinarith [Real.exp_pos x, Real.exp_pos 0]
